articles.author: Ian Smith, Kenza Bryan
articles.title: Insurance industry turmoil over climate alliance exodus - Financial Times
articles.description: Departures come as anti-ESG campaigners claim group is anti-competitive
articles.content: Dark smoke billowing across the Richard Rogers-designed Lloyds of London headquarters and the banner unfurled by climate protesters last week provided a visible reminder of the political war over the… [+7055 chars]
